page.title: 11Maritime museum
page.content: The maritime museum used to be the Queens house.It has a million and a half visitors a year. A Scottish merchant called Sir James Caird paid for the restoration of the museum.It is the biggest maritime museum in England and the most beautiful. There are three main parts to the museum . There is the east wing and a gallery which houses small merchant sailing ships. The west wing is the largest part of the museum. It has bookshops, library, the main archives and the research room and an information bureau.Neptune hall is the newest part and is devoted to the development of boats through the ages.
